name: Ultimate Car Driving Simulator: Classics
description:
Play this action adventure car driving and speed car race with ultimate classic cars. Extreme car drift and car racing missions are waiting in Ultimate Car Driving Simulator: Classics. Drive vintage cars range with unlimited customization and tons of classic cars in sports cars garage. The best classic car driving simulator game of 2018 comes with the most realistic driving physics, with Russian car and American classic car range. Providing huge open world addictive gameplay and endless fun. Complete multiple ultimate car driving, checkpoint racing, car drift and classic cars demolition missions with your favorite classic drift racing car.

Drift Car Real Driving Simulation:
Have you ever drift with old vintage cars? We customized range of classic cars for extreme drift driving on city roads. Create road rampage with your classic muscle car or Russian classic car. Ultimate car driving game is burnouts and illegal stunts and drifting among traffic racing roads. Real physics is making the driving in classic cars ultimate fun. Classic super cars pack is there in the garage drive around in the multiple environments and unlock the more powerful real classic cars for drift car racing in the driving simulator. Extreme Racing game gives you opportunity of drift if you like hit the pavement while drift no fear of damage.

Checkpoint Speed Car Race:
Choose best classic car for speed racing and earn maximum scores to unlock more stylish classic drift racing cars. In race 3d you have incredible checkpoint racing competition to perform classic car mad tricks and drifting. Vintage city car racing is a thrilling and exciting supercar racing simulation game for fastest car drivers on the city streets. Start the ultimate race and win the mania that is the milestone in the classics genre of amazing race 3d speed car games with Ultimate Car Driving Simulator: Classics. Race & drive the sports car on the asphalt roads for classic cars racing and show your real extreme driving skills as fast highway furious car racer.

Car Stunt Challenge & Destruction Missions:
Complete the addictive racing stunt challenge 2018 with your classic cars in the brand new driving simulator game. Become a classic car racer and ready to perform some illegal classic car stunts in car stunt challenge. Perform impossible stunt racing with stunts car driving fun on risky dangerous curvy tracks. Tricky jumps, ramp stunt jump and deadly hurdles for extreme stunt driving in real driving sim. Play stunt race in stunt car simulator. Car stunt challenge has multiple classic stunt car fast racing & drift action adventure.

Gameplay:

↗ Use steer button to left or right.
↗ Different camera angles for easy driving.
↗ Clear the drift racing, stunt challenge or destruction mission to earn more cash.
↗ Unlock different classic vehicles & classic SUV’s for ultimate driving.
↗ Use nitro to speed up your classic suv car.

More Features of Ultimate Car Driving Simulator: Classics

• Superb car physics & real traffic system for real driving.
• Amazing environments & cool engine sound effects.
• Variety of Classic racing cars to choose from.
• Extremely accurate & precise driving skills.
• Car paint, color & wheel alloy rim customization.
• Next generation ultra HD graphics.
• Narrow ramps & extreme hurdles while drift racing & destruction missions.
• 3D checkpoint racing lap physics with intuitive controls.

Play Ultimate Car Driving Simulator: Classics and don’t forget to give us your feedback & suggestions!!
